explains: v. 确保，保证；保护，使安全

sentences.en: We tried to ensure that everyone got a fair deal.
sentences.cn: 我们曾尽力保证每个人都受到公平待遇。

sentences.en: Our role is to ensure liaison between schools and parents.
sentences.cn: 我们的作用是确保学校与家长间的联系。

sentences.en: They could not ensure a smooth transfer of political power.
sentences.cn: 他们无法保证政权的顺利交接。
